originContent: <div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; gap: 10px;">
translatedContent: <div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; gap: 10px;">

originContent: Please note that before your evaluation process, when Docker loads the databases, errors may occasionally occur due to environment inconsistency (these will not terminate the process but will appear in the Docker logs). As a result, some databases may fail to load properly, leading to empty databases. This will cause the evaluation results to be abnormally low.
translatedContent: Harap diperhatikan bahwa sebelum proses evaluasi Anda, saat Docker memuat database, kesalahan kadang-kadang dapat terjadi karena inkonsistensi lingkungan (ini tidak akan menghentikan proses tetapi akan muncul di log Docker). Akibatnya, beberapa database mungkin gagal dimuat dengan benar, sehingga database menjadi kosong. Hal ini akan menyebabkan hasil evaluasi menjadi sangat rendah.

originContent: üëâ Therefore, we strongly recommend checking the Docker logs for any errors **before running the evaluation** and verifying that all databases have been successfully loaded.
translatedContent: üëâ Oleh karena itu, kami sangat menyarankan untuk memeriksa log Docker untuk setiap kesalahan **sebelum menjalankan evaluasi** dan memastikan semua database telah berhasil dimuat.

originContent: üëâ We have updated the **Submission Guidelines**, where the customized agent scaffolds are supported. Please feel free to take a look at our detailed submission guidelines [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F1DSqHDBzGvXFlWU8iCl9otkqxIefgcH/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=108161566779099489782&rtpof=true&sd=true).
translatedContent: üëâ Kami telah memperbarui **Pedoman Pengiriman**, yang kini mendukung kerangka kerja agen yang telah dikustomisasi. Silakan lihat pedoman pengiriman secara detail [di sini](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1F1DSqHDBzGvXFlWU8iCl9otkqxIefgcH/edit?usp=sharing&ouid=108161566779099489782&rtpof=true&sd=true).

originContent: - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Bug Fix** & üê≥ **Docker update**: Update the sqlglot version to 26.16.4 to fix the bug that the sql parser cannot parse the SQL correctly for user simulator. You could fix this by re-install it by `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` env. The `bird_interact_eval` image is also updated, so you could also pull it and recreate the `bird_interact_eval` container.
translatedContent: - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Perbaikan Bug** & üê≥ **Update Docker**: Memperbarui versi sqlglot ke 26.16.4 untuk memperbaiki bug di mana parser SQL tidak dapat mem-parsing SQL dengan benar untuk simulator pengguna. Anda dapat memperbaikinya dengan menginstal ulang menggunakan `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` di lingkungan `bird_interact_eval`. Gambar `bird_interact_eval` juga telah diperbarui, sehingga Anda juga bisa menariknya dan membuat ulang kontainer `bird_interact_eval`.

originContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: We added the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually!
translatedContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Update Docker**: Kami menambahkan docker untuk Full DB Env. Dan kami telah mengunggah 3 gambar docker (Base/Full DB Env dan lingkungan evaluasi untuk `a-Interact` dan `c-Interact`) ke Docker Hub guna memudahkan penyiapan lingkungan. Tidak perlu mengunduh DB dump dan membangun gambar secara manual!

originContent: It presents the full details, methodology, and evaluation of our interactive text-to-SQL benchmark.
translatedContent: Makalah ini menyajikan detail lengkap, metodologi, dan evaluasi dari benchmark interaktif text-to-SQL kami.

originContent: üëâ Check it out and know more about the ideas behind [BIRD-Interact](https://bird-interact.github.io/).
translatedContent: üëâ Silakan lihat dan pelajari lebih lanjut tentang ide di balik [BIRD-Interact](https://bird-interact.github.io/).

originContent: - [2025-08-26] üöÄ We're excited to announce the release of the **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)** set!
translatedContent: - [2025-08-26] üöÄ Kami sangat senang mengumumkan perilisan set **[BIRD-Interact-Full (600)](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/bird-interact-full)**!

originContent: It's a tough one ‚Äî the best LLMs are only achieving a **16.33%** success rate, with just **10.0%** on the `c-interact` and `a-interact` portions.
translatedContent: Set ini sangat menantang ‚Äî LLM terbaik hanya mencapai tingkat keberhasilan **16.33%**, dengan hanya **10.0%** pada bagian `c-interact` dan `a-interact`.

originContent: üëâ For more details, please visit our [project website](https://bird-interact.github.io/).
translatedContent: üëâ Untuk detail lebih lanjut, silakan kunjungi [website proyek](https://bird-interact.github.io/).

originContent: - [2025-08-26] üì¨ We'll be sending the **Ground Truth & Test cases** to our mailing list this week.
translatedContent: - [2025-08-26] üì¨ Kami akan mengirimkan **Ground Truth & Test case** ke milis kami minggu ini.

originContent: If you want early access, please send an email as instructed on the site for an **automatic download**.
translatedContent: Jika Anda ingin akses awal, silakan kirim email sesuai instruksi di situs untuk **unduh otomatis**.

originContent: - [2025-08-26] üíæ On another note, we've also released a SQLite version of **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** for easier local research.
translatedContent: - [2025-08-26] üíæ Sebagai catatan lain, kami juga telah merilis versi SQLite dari **[LiveSQLBench-Lite](https://huggingface.co/datasets/birdsql/livesqlbench-base-lite-sqlite)** untuk penelitian lokal yang lebih mudah.

originContent: The full **LiveSQLBench-Base** and **-Large** versions are coming soon!
translatedContent: Versi lengkap **LiveSQLBench-Base** dan **-Large** akan segera hadir!

originContent: - [2025-08-22] **Bug Fix**: In Bird-Interact-Agent code, we fixed a bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc.
translatedContent: - [2025-08-22] **Perbaikan Bug**: Pada kode Bird-Interact-Agent, kami memperbaiki bug di mana saat evaluasi fase-2 SQL, SQL fase-1 yang tersimpan tidak dapat dijalankan dengan sukses, sehingga menurunkan tingkat keberhasilan Fase-2. Bug ini hanya mempengaruhi tugas di mana SQL fase1 melakukan beberapa operasi pada database, seperti CREATE table, dll.

originContent: BIRD-INTERACT, an interactive text-to-SQL benchmark, **re-imagines Text-to-SQL evaluation via lens of dynamic interactions**.
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT, sebuah benchmark interaktif text-to-SQL, **mengimajinasikan kembali evaluasi Text-to-SQL melalui lensa interaksi dinamis**.

originContent: The environment blends a hierarchical knowledge base, database documentation and a function-driven user simulator to recreate authentic enterprise environments across full **CRUD** operations.
translatedContent: Lingkungan ini menggabungkan basis pengetahuan hierarkis, dokumentasi basis data, dan simulator pengguna berbasis fungsi untuk menciptakan kembali lingkungan perusahaan yang autentik pada seluruh operasi **CRUD**.

originContent: It offers two rigorous test modes: (1) passive **Conversational Interaction** and (2) active **Agentic Interaction**, spanning 600 annotated tasks including Business Intelligence (BI), CRUD operations and etc., each guarded by executable test cases.
translatedContent: Benchmark ini menawarkan dua mode uji yang ketat: (1) **Interaksi Percakapan** pasif dan (2) **Interaksi Agenik** aktif, mencakup 600 tugas beranotasi termasuk Business Intelligence (BI), operasi CRUD dan lain-lain, masing-masing dijaga oleh kasus uji yang dapat dieksekusi.

originContent: Typical evaluations trigger 1,968-5,496 interaction turns between model and user simulator, while state-of-the-art reasoning models currently solve only **‚âà24%** and **‚âà18%** of tasks, underscoring the benchmark's challenge.
translatedContent: Evaluasi tipikal memicu 1.968-5.496 giliran interaksi antara model dan simulator pengguna, sementara model penalaran mutakhir saat ini hanya menyelesaikan **‚âà24%** dan **‚âà18%** tugas, menekankan tantangan benchmark ini.

originContent: style="width: 100%; min-width: 100px; display: block; margin: auto; ">
translatedContent: style="width: 100%; min-width: 100px; display: block; margin: auto; ">

originContent: BIRD-INTERACT supports two evaluation modes as mentioned above:
translatedContent: BIRD-INTERACT mendukung dua mode evaluasi seperti yang telah disebutkan di atas:

originContent: - **c-Interact**: Conversational Interaction which is a passive mode and the workflow is fixed. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_conv`.
translatedContent: - **c-Interact**: Interaksi Percakapan yang merupakan mode pasif dan alur kerjanya tetap. Kode dan informasi detail dapat ditemukan di `bird_interact_conv`.

originContent: - **a-Interact**: Agentic Interaction which is an embodied active mode where the workflow is dynamic and led by models. The code and detailed information can be found in `bird_interact_agent`.
translatedContent: - **a-Interact**: Interaksi Agenik yang merupakan mode aktif yang diwujudkan di mana alur kerja dinamis dan dipimpin oleh model. Kode dan informasi detail dapat ditemukan di `bird_interact_agent`.

originContent: We are releasing a lite version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, which includes 270 high-quality real-world tasks specifically for PostgreSQL. This is a good starting point for quick experimentation.
translatedContent: Kami merilis versi lite dari BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-lite-exp`, yang mencakup 270 tugas berkualitas tinggi dari dunia nyata khusus untuk PostgreSQL. Ini adalah titik awal yang baik untuk eksperimen cepat.

originContent: The full version of BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, is a comprehensive benchmark that includes 600 tasks for PostgreSQL. It covers a wide range of SQL operations and user queries. The full version is coming soon.
translatedContent: Versi lengkap dari BIRD-INTERACT, `bird-interact-full`, merupakan benchmark komprehensif yang mencakup 600 tugas untuk PostgreSQL. Versi ini mencakup berbagai operasi SQL dan kueri pengguna. Versi lengkap akan segera hadir.

originContent: | Rank | Model Name         | Normalized Reward | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Level              |
translatedContent: | Peringkat | Nama Model      | Reward Normalisasi | Biaya Rata-rata (USD)/Tugas | Level             |

originContent: | Rank | Model Name         | Normalized Reward | Avg Cost (USD)/Task | Level                    |
translatedContent: | Peringkat | Nama Model         | Reward Ternormalisasi | Rata-rata Biaya (USD)/Tugas | Level                    |

originContent: > \* Budget Parameters: Starting Budget/User Patience Budget, measured by our virtual currency *bird-coin*s . Refer to [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) for more details.
translatedContent: > \* Parameter Anggaran: Anggaran Awal/Anggaran Kesabaran Pengguna, diukur dengan mata uang virtual kami *bird-coin*s . Lihat [bird_interact_agent/README.md](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/bird_interact_agent/README.md#task-setting) untuk detail lebih lanjut.

originContent: Interaction-Time Scaling (ITS) refers to a model's ability to continuously increase its end performance through multi-turn interactions. When this interactive performance surpasses the model's idealized single-turn performance on a fully specified, unambiguous task, we say it satisfies the **ITS law**. As user patience grows and interaction turns accumulate, performance keeps improving, demonstrating that the model can sustain effective communication over extended dialogue. Currently, we only find claude-3-7-sonnet satisfies the ITS law.
translatedContent: Skala Waktu Interaksi (ITS) mengacu pada kemampuan model untuk terus meningkatkan performa akhirnya melalui interaksi multi-putaran. Ketika performa interaktif ini melampaui performa ideal model pada tugas satu putaran yang sudah ditentukan dan tidak ambigu, kami katakan model tersebut memenuhi **hukum ITS**. Saat kesabaran pengguna bertambah dan jumlah putaran interaksi meningkat, performa terus meningkat, menunjukkan bahwa model dapat mempertahankan komunikasi efektif dalam dialog yang panjang. Saat ini, hanya claude-3-7-sonnet yang ditemukan memenuhi hukum ITS.

originContent: style="width: 100%; min-width: 100px; display: block; margin: auto; ">
translatedContent: style="width: 100%; min-width: 100px; display: block; margin: auto; ">

originContent: 1. Run Docker containers for bird-interact-lite database, bird-interact-full database, and evaluation environment:
translatedContent: 1. Jalankan kontainer Docker untuk database bird-interact-lite, database bird-interact-full, dan lingkungan evaluasi:

originContent: > If you just want to evaluate on `bird-interact-lite`, you could comment out the [`postgresql_full` service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) in `docker-compose.yml` to speed up the environment setup.
translatedContent: > Jika Anda hanya ingin melakukan evaluasi pada `bird-interact-lite`, Anda bisa memberi komentar pada layanan [`postgresql_full`](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/./env/docker-compose.yml#L21-L31) di `docker-compose.yml` untuk mempercepat proses setup lingkungan.

originContent: Wait for several minutes for database initialization.
translatedContent: Tunggu beberapa menit untuk inisialisasi basis data.

originContent: You could track the building progress by:
translatedContent: Anda dapat memantau kemajuan pembangunan dengan:

originContent: docker compose logs -f --tail=100 bird_interact_postgresql_full # or bird_interact_postgresql for bird-interact-lite
translatedContent: docker compose logs -f --tail=100 bird_interact_postgresql_full # or bird_interact_postgresql for bird-interact-lite

originContent: If finished, you should see the logs without errors like:
translatedContent: Jika selesai, Anda seharusnya melihat log tanpa kesalahan seperti:

originContent: bird_interact_postgresql_full  | 2025-10-28 17:58:30.413 HKT [1] LOG:  database system is ready to accept connection
translatedContent: bird_interact_postgresql_full  | 2025-10-28 17:58:30.413 HKT [1] LOG:  database system is ready to accept connection

originContent: If you have created containers before and want to recreate it, you could run the following command:
translatedContent: Jika Anda telah membuat container sebelumnya dan ingin membuatnya kembali, Anda dapat menjalankan perintah berikut:

originContent: docker compose down -v # this cmd removes the containers and the volumes
translatedContent: docker compose down -v # this cmd removes the containers and the volumes

originContent: docker compose pull   # pull the latest images from Docker Hub
translatedContent: docker compose pull   # pull the latest images from Docker Hub

originContent: docker compose up -d --force-recreate # build and start the containers again. --force-recreate means force the recreation of the containers.
translatedContent: docker compose up -d --force-recreate # build and start the containers again. --force-recreate means force the recreation of the containers.

originContent: # Or `docker compose up -d --force-recreate bird_interact_eval` to only recreate the bird_interact_eval container about evalution code environment.
translatedContent: # Or `docker compose up -d --force-recreate bird_interact_eval` to only recreate the bird_interact_eval container about evalution code environment.

originContent: This runs 3 containers using prebuilt images from Docker Hub:
translatedContent: Ini menjalankan 3 container menggunakan image yang sudah dibangun dari Docker Hub:

originContent: Now, you could start the evaluation environment by executing the following command:
translatedContent: Sekarang, Anda dapat memulai lingkungan evaluasi dengan menjalankan perintah berikut:
2. (Opsional) Bangun lingkungan secara manual (jika Anda ingin membangun image dari awal):

originContent: 2. (Optional) Build the environment manually (if you want to build the images from scratch):

translatedContent: - Bangun lingkungan secara manual dengan menjalankan `docker-compose.build.yml`.

originContent: - Build the environment manually by running `docker-compose.build.yml`.
3. (Recommended) Check the database containers are built and running successfully.
translatedContent: 3. (Direkomendasikan) Periksa bahwa kontainer basis data telah dibangun dan berjalan dengan sukses.

originContent: -  Print the container build logs to ensure that the databases are built successfully without errors:
translatedContent: -  Cetak log pembuatan kontainer untuk memastikan bahwa basis data telah dibangun dengan sukses tanpa kesalahan:

originContent: If errors occur, `"Errors occurred during import:"` will be printed in the log files.
translatedContent: Jika terjadi kesalahan, `"Terjadi kesalahan selama impor:"` akan dicetak di file log.

originContent: -  Check if the database containers are in good shape.
translatedContent: -  Periksa apakah kontainer basis data dalam kondisi baik.

originContent: Use our provided Python script to verify database metadata:
translatedContent: Gunakan skrip Python yang kami sediakan untuk memverifikasi metadata basis data:

originContent: - **Database:** The complete PostgreSQL database can be download from [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view) and [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view).
translatedContent: - **Basis Data:** Basis data PostgreSQL lengkap dapat diunduh dari [bird-interact-lite](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QIGQlRKbkqApAOrQXPqFJgUg8rQ7HRRZ/view) dan [bird-interact-full](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1V9SFIWebi27JtaDUAScG1xE9ELbYcWLR/view).

originContent: - **data:** Each data instance contain the following main parts:
translatedContent: - **data:** Setiap instance data berisi bagian utama berikut:

originContent: - `amb_user_query`: The user query with injected ambiguities.
translatedContent: - `amb_user_query`: Permintaan pengguna dengan ambiguitas yang disisipkan.

originContent: - `user_query_ambiguity`: The ambiguities injected into the user query.
translatedContent: - `user_query_ambiguity`: Ambiguitas yang disisipkan ke permintaan pengguna.

originContent: - `non_critical_ambiguity`: The non-critical ambiguities like order, limit, etc.
translatedContent: - `non_critical_ambiguity`: Ambiguitas non-kritis seperti urutan, batas, dll.

originContent: - `knowledge_ambiguity`: The ambiguities created by masked external knowledges.
translatedContent: - `knowledge_ambiguity`: Ambiguitas yang dibuat dari pengetahuan eksternal yang disembunyikan.

originContent: - `preprocess_sql`: SQL queries to run before executing the solution or prediction.
translatedContent: - `preprocess_sql`: Kueri SQL yang dijalankan sebelum mengeksekusi solusi atau prediksi.

originContent: - `clean_up_sql`: SQL queries to run after the test cases to revert any changes made to the database.
translatedContent: - `clean_up_sql`: Kueri SQL yang dijalankan setelah kasus uji untuk membalik perubahan pada basis data.

originContent: - `test_cases`: A set of test cases to validate the predicted corrected SQL.
translatedContent: - `test_cases`: Sekumpulan kasus uji untuk memvalidasi SQL yang dikoreksi hasil prediksi.
- `follow_up`: Pertanyaan lanjutan yang telah diberi label.

originContent: - `external_knowledge`: The external knowledge related to the specific task.
translatedContent: - `external_knowledge`: Pengetahuan eksternal yang terkait dengan tugas spesifik.

originContent: - **evaluation:** The evaluation code is available in the [`./evaluation`](./evaluation) directory.
To avoid data leakage by auto-crawling, we do not include GT solution sqls and test cases along with data.
translatedContent: Untuk menghindari kebocoran data melalui auto-crawling, kami tidak menyertakan sql solusi GT dan kasus uji bersama data.

originContent: please email [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) with the tag `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` or `[bird-interact-full GT&Test Cases]` in the title for ground truth and test cases for the bird-interact-lite or bird-interact-full dataset, which will be sent automatically.
translatedContent: silakan email [bird.bench25@gmail.com](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/bird-bench/BIRD-Interact/main/mailto:bird.bench25@gmail.com) dengan tag `[bird-interact-lite GT&Test Cases]` atau `[bird-interact-full GT&Test Cases]` di judul untuk ground truth dan kasus uji untuk dataset bird-interact-lite atau bird-interact-full, yang akan dikirim secara otomatis.

originContent: ### Combine the public data with the ground truth and test cases
translatedContent: ### Menggabungkan data publik dengan ground truth dan kasus uji

originContent: Then use the following script to combine the public data with the ground truth and test cases:
translatedContent: Kemudian gunakan skrip berikut untuk menggabungkan data publik dengan ground truth dan kasus uji:

originContent: Take the full version as an example:

python combine_public_with_gt.py /path/to/bird-interact-full/bird_interact_data.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl  # bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl is the data of ground-truth fields, which is obtained by emailing us.
translatedContent: python combine_public_with_gt.py /path/to/bird-interact-full/bird_interact_data.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl /path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl  # bird_interact_full_gt_kg_testcases_08022.jsonl is the data of ground-truth fields, which is obtained by emailing us.

originContent: This will create a new file at `/path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl` with the combined data.
translatedContent: Ini akan membuat file baru di `/path/to/bird_interact_data.jsonl` dengan data yang telah digabungkan.

originContent: (2) Then replace the original public data with the combined data:
translatedContent: (2) Kemudian ganti data publik asli dengan data yang telah digabungkan:

originContent: Same for the other versions: bird-interact-lite, mini version, etc. Just set correct paths for the public data and the ground truth and test cases, and then replace the public data with the combined data.
translatedContent: Sama juga untuk versi lainnya: bird-interact-lite, versi mini, dll. Cukup atur jalur yang benar untuk data publik dan ground truth serta test case, lalu ganti data publik dengan data gabungan.

originContent: You can download the dataset from HuggingFace using the following command:
translatedContent: Anda dapat mengunduh dataset dari HuggingFace dengan perintah berikut:

originContent: The details about running **a-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; and **c-interact** can be found in `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.
translatedContent: Detail tentang menjalankan **a-interact** dapat ditemukan di `./bird_interact_agent/README.md`; dan **c-interact** dapat ditemukan di `./bird_interact_conv/README.md`.

originContent: We would like to express our sincere gratitude to **Irina Saparina**, **Mohammadreza Pourreza**, **Mehdi Bouzouina**, **Hailong Li**, **Jiatong Shi**, and Professor **Shinji Watanabe** for their fruitful discussions and valuable insights that helped improve this project.
translatedContent: Kami ingin mengucapkan terima kasih yang sebesar-besarnya kepada **Irina Saparina**, **Mohammadreza Pourreza**, **Mehdi Bouzouina**, **Hailong Li**, **Jiatong Shi**, dan Profesor **Shinji Watanabe** atas diskusi yang bermanfaat dan wawasan berharga yang membantu meningkatkan proyek ini.

originContent: - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Bug Fix** & üê≥ **Docker update**: Update the sqlglot version to 26.16.4 to fix the bug that the sql parser cannot parse the SQL correctly for user simulator. You could fix this by re-install it by `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` in the `bird_interact_eval` env. The `bird_interact_eval` image is also updated, so you could also pull it and recreate the `bird_interact_eval` container.
translatedContent: - [2025-11-06] üêõ **Perbaikan Bug** & üê≥ **Pembaruan Docker**: Memperbarui versi sqlglot ke 26.16.4 untuk memperbaiki bug di mana sql parser tidak dapat mengurai SQL dengan benar untuk simulator pengguna. Anda dapat memperbaikinya dengan menginstal ulang menggunakan `pip install sqlglot==26.16.4` di lingkungan `bird_interact_eval`. Image `bird_interact_eval` juga telah diperbarui, jadi Anda juga bisa menariknya dan membuat ulang kontainer `bird_interact_eval`.

originContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Docker update**: Add the docker for Full DB Env. And we pushed 3 docker images (Base/Full DB Env and the evaluation environment for both `a-Interact` and `c-Interact`) to Docker Hub to facilitate the environment setup. No need to download the DB dumps and build the images manually! Please pull the latest images from Docker Hub and recreates the containers, e.g. using `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate`.
translatedContent: - [2025-10-21] üê≥ **Pembaruan Docker**: Menambahkan docker untuk Full DB Env. Dan kami telah mengunggah 3 image docker (Base/Full DB Env dan lingkungan evaluasi untuk `a-Interact` dan `c-Interact`) ke Docker Hub untuk mempermudah penyiapan lingkungan. Tidak perlu mengunduh dump DB dan membangun image secara manual! Silakan tarik image terbaru dari Docker Hub dan buat ulang kontainernya, misalnya menggunakan `docker compose down -v && docker compose pull && docker compose up -d --force-recreate`.

originContent: - [2025-08-22]  üêõ **Bug Fix**: Fix the bug that when evaluating phase-2 SQL, the stored phase-1 SQL cannot be executed successfully, leading to a lower success rate of Phase-2. This bug only affects those tasks where phase1 sql does some operations on the database, e.g. CREATE table, etc.
translatedContent: - [2025-08-22]  üêõ **Perbaikan Bug**: Memperbaiki bug di mana saat mengevaluasi SQL fase-2, SQL fase-1 yang disimpan tidak dapat dijalankan dengan sukses, sehingga menyebabkan tingkat keberhasilan Fase-2 lebih rendah. Bug ini hanya mempengaruhi tugas di mana sql fase1 melakukan operasi pada basis data, misalnya CREATE table, dll.
